sentences.english: The amount of freight transported by motor carriers has steadily increased over the years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，汽運承擔的運輸量持續穩步地上升。

sentences.english: The conveyance statistics plays an important role in the management of metallurgical automobile conveyance company.
sentences.chinese: 運輸統計在冶金汽運公司經營管理中具有重要地位。

sentences.english: Motor carriers are more flexible than other modes.
sentences.chinese: 與其他運輸方式相比，汽運更加靈活。
